text: ql: allahuma ya khaliq alsmwat wal'ard wmbdehma ealaa ghyr mithal sbq, ealam alsiri walelanyt, 'ant tafsil bayn eibadik yawm alqiamat fima kanuu fih yakhtalifun min alqawl fyk, wafi ezmtk wsltank wal'iiman bik wbrswlk, ahdny lamaa akhtulif fih min alhaqi b'idhnk, 'iinak tahdi man tasha' 'iilaa sirat mstqym. wakan hdha min deayh salaa allah ealayh wslm, wahu telym lileibad balaltja' 'iilaa allah teala, wdeayh basmayh alhsna wsfath alela
